Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.2223a0c2-b2b0-44c7-9218-e007006f15a1.prompt=Component ID bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.276b0220-f7ec-4849-8036-7fc0ac10221a.prompt=Enter a value for authType bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.29934146-27d0-48d8-84bc-a88dce438b4b.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.2b2661a5-da66-4e43-8731-a5bdfd779744.prompt=Component ID bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.2edbc163-433c-4296-b283-53aa415af887.prompt=User Identifier bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.373a7c96-796e-47e9-83e6-d6d2bef6990b.prompt=Component ID bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.43a426bc-9dc0-433d-956a-b5d3a6bb51b4.prompt=User Identifier bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.456eb1a4-7045-4509-9b3c-bee4a4d8d3f1.prompt=Enter a value for kerberosConfFile bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.4f7ed69e-cc26-48da-8acc-4e8b99d0cbb2.prompt=Enter a value for proxyUsername bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.592bc8d4-ade9-4f87-a211-bcbc8f0e6d8f.prompt=Component ID bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.5ef0f6c5-6f6e-4298-bc4a-b1b4fdae44ef.prompt=User Identifier bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.61c6b167-66ce-4e62-8e47-8192217b2ec8.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.71461518-7191-456e-9c0f-b0635908e252.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPort bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.7c2b615a-bd38-4810-bddf-a50449eca5af.description= Inputs\: host - vCenter DNS name/IP Address username - vCenter user password - vCenter user password port - vCenter port protocol - vCenter protocol hypervisorName - Hypervisor DNS name/IP Address dataStore - Datastore of the hypervior datacenterName - Datacenter name hostname - VM Server name templateReference - VM Template name osType - OS Type of the template CPUs - CPU Count to be assigned Memory - Memory Size to be assigned Results\: vmId - VM Identifies of the created VM ipAddress - IP Address of the created VM macAddress - MAC Address of the created VM bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.7e420a12-df50-4f6c-a953-28e2edf78c49.prompt=Component ID bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.8c328385-ff2a-4aa8-865b-1e3cc7a34670.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.8dcb7e75-eb5e-40b9-9b49-3d7f35257745.prompt=Process Instance ID bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.914f152c-de9a-403a-ae5e-c61286459437.prompt=Enter a value for keystore bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.98e7de9b-096c-438c-a025-0f2026f02513.prompt=Enter a value for encodeURL bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.9f596141-4c1e-4137-9be0-39a541898fc1.prompt=Enter a value for useCookies bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.a7cafb78-7dd8-466b-b39b-d434f04e3f14.prompt=Enter a value for timeout bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.af669b08-79da-4e20-943f-a5d24540e47a.prompt=Enter a value for trustKeystore bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.b00e0e41-e411-4465-b86a-2bac8674726c.description=
This workflow updates service component display name.

Inputs-
componentId – Service component id
userIdentifier  - User Identifier id
displayName – Display name of the service component to be added
authType - The authentication type that this operation uses when trying to execute the request on the target server.
valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

Outputs-
document  – returned XML document from API
bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.b50c05b8-8d8e-49e6-ba7f-34d7114dea67.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.b9cefb9a-fc77-4368-9ff9-5184bbf52480.prompt=Enter a value for proxy bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.c093683d-c3f5-4904-b29c-04cdce2095b8.prompt=Process Instance ID bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.c80aaa7a-f429-469b-8854-8bdf878b37e3.prompt=User Identifier bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.c9b150d7-266a-4516-afbc-27daa4c22349.prompt=Enter a value for trustPassword bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.caa8df60-9113-4b2c-ba4c-5f7fb39aa1c2.prompt=User Identifier bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.cc11ac47-3886-40d3-a1e8-73a7a4d143b2.prompt=User Identifier bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.cd48157c-8350-4a05-a718-a48620b81609.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.ce7e87a0-e921-46a5-8ef0-5a7f8292f357.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPassword bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.ddc24ba6-6212-469a-a20f-0a3f5422f581.prompt=User Identifier bb1ac004-9cfe-4092-9598-332d67cc235d.description=
Provision a  Simple Vcenter Linux VM from a VM template. 

Inputs Parameters\:

 CSA_CONTEXT_ID – CSA Context Id
 CSA_PROCESS_ID – CSA Process Instance Id
 SVC_COMPONENT_ID - This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
 RSC_PROVIDER_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL - This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
 RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
  		Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE - This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
 RSC_POOL_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
 SVC_INSTANCE_ID - This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 PRN_COMPONENT_ID – This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
 REQ_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
 REQ_USER_ID - This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
 USR_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
 RSC_BINDING_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

Responses\:
 success - The operation completed successfully.
 failure - Something went wrong.

flow.name: vCenter Sample - Simple Compute Linux - Deploy
